meanings.definition: The practice or methods of a quack.
meanings.sent1: Her quackism was evident in the way she promoted fake cures.
meanings.sent2: The quackism of the fraudulent doctor was exposed by medical experts.
meanings.sent3: Despite his quackism, he managed to convince some people of his miracle treatments.
meanings.sent4: The quackism of the charlatan was like a dark cloud over the medical community.
meanings.sent5: The dangers of quackism in healthcare cannot be underestimated.

meanings.definition: The characteristic or behavior of a quack.
meanings.sent1: His quackism was apparent in his outlandish claims of instant healing.
meanings.sent2: People were wary of the quackism displayed by the unlicensed practitioner.
meanings.sent3: The quackism of the self-proclaimed healer was both amusing and concerning.
meanings.sent4: The quackism of the fraudster was like a stain on the reputation of genuine doctors.
meanings.sent5: The public should be educated to recognize and avoid quackism in medicine.
